---
page_title: "Resource: auth0_connection_profile"
description: |-
  Manage Auth0 connection profiles. Connection profiles allow you to store configuration templates for connections.
---

# Resource: auth0_connection_profile

Manage Auth0 connection profiles. Connection profiles allow you to store configuration templates for connections.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the connection profile.

### Optional

- `connection_config` (Block List, Max: 1) Connection configuration for the profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--connection_config))
- `connection_name_prefix_template` (String) Template for generating connection names from the profile.
- `enabled_features` (List of String) List of enabled features for the connection profile.
- `organization` (Block List, Max: 1) Organization associated with the connection profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--organization))
- `strategy_overrides` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy overrides for the connection profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--connection_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `connection_config`


<a id="nestedblock--organization"></a>
### Nested Schema for `organization`

Optional:

- `assign_membership_on_login` (String) Whether to assign membership on login.
- `show_as_button` (String) Whether to show organization as a button.


<a id="nestedblock--strategy_overrides"></a>
### Nested Schema for `strategy_overrides`

Optional:

- `ad` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--ad))
- `adfs` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--adfs))
- `google_apps` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--google_apps))
- `oidc` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--oidc))
- `okta` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--okta))
- `pingfederate` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--pingfederate))
- `samlp` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--samlp))
- `waad` (Block List, Max: 1) Strategy override configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--strategy_overrides--waad))
